pdbeccdutils.core¶

class pdbeccdutils.core.component.Component(mol, properties=None, descriptors=None)¶

Wrapper for the rdkit.Chem.rdchem.Mol object enabling some of its functionality and handlingpossible erroneous situations.

Presently implemented:
  • sanitization
  • 2D depiction
  • 3D conformation calculation
TODO:
  • cml generation
  • xml generation
  • proper pdb export with names (soon to follow)
  • mmcif export
Returns:instance object
Return type:pdbeccdutils.utils.Component
compute_2d(manager, remove_hs=True)¶

Compute 2d depiction of the component using flattening manager instance

Parameters:
  • manager (pdbeccdutils.utils.FlatteningManager) – Instance of the flattening class.
  • remove_hs (bool, optional) – Defaults to True. Remove hydrogens prior to depiction.
Returns:

2D depiction of the ligand.
Return type:

rdkit.Chem.rdchem.Mol
compute_3d()¶

Generate 3D coordinates using ETKDG method from RdKit.

Returns:Result of the structure generation process.
Return type:bool
export_2d_svg(file_name, width=500, names=False)¶

Save 2d depiction of the component as an SVG file.

Parameters:
  • file_name (str) – path to store 2d depiction. width (int, optional): Defaults to 500. Width of a frame in pixels.
  • names (bool, optional) – Defaults to False. Whether or not to include atom names in depiction. If atom name is not set, element symbol is used instead.
export_mol_representation(remove_hs=True, str_format='sdf', conf_type=<ConformerType.AllConformers: 5>)¶

Export a component representation in given format. If conf_type is None, all the conformers are exported

Parameters:
  • remove_hs (bool, optional) – Defaults to True. include hydrogens.
  • str_format (str, optional) – Defaults to ‘sdf’. Data format
  • conf_type (ConformerType, optional) – Defaults to None.
Raises:
  • NotImplementedError – currently for mmcif option
  • ValueError – For unknown format or conformer
Returns:

string representation of the compound
Return type:

str
is_degenerated_conformer(type)¶

Determine if given conformer has missing coordinates. This can be used to determine, whether or not the coordinates should be regenerated.

Parameters:type (pdbeccdutils.core.ConformerType) – type of coformer to be inspected.
Raises:ValueError – If given conformer does not exist.
Returns:true if more 1 atom has coordinates [0, 0, 0]
Return type:bool
locate_fragment(mol)¶

Identify substructure match in the component.

Parameters:mol (rdkit.Chem.rdchem.Mol) – Fragment to be matched with structure
Returns:list of fragments identified in the component as a list of Atoms.
Return type:list(list(rdkit.Chem.rdchem.Atoms))
sanitize(fast=True)¶

Attempts to sanitize mol in place. RDKit’s standard error can be processed in order to find out what went wrong with sanitization to fix the molecule. Presently, that function is slow (perhaps due to the stream?) and needs more debuging to find out what is happening there.

Parameters:fast (bool, optional) – Defaults to True. TODO until the speed issue is fixed.
Returns:Result of the sanitization process.
Return type:bool

pdbeccdutils.core.structure_reader.read_pdb_cif_file(path_to_cif)¶

Read in single wwpdb cif component and create its internal representation.

Parameters:path_to_cif (str) – Path to the cif file
Raises:ValueError – if file does not exist
Returns:Results of the parsing altogether with the internal representation of the component.
Return type:StructureReaderResult
pdbeccdutils.core.structure_reader.read_pdb_components_file(path_to_cif)¶

Process multiple compounds stored in the wwpdb CCD components.cif file.

Parameters:path_to_cif (str) – Path to the components.cif file with multiple ligands in it.
Raises:ValueError – if the file does not exist.
Returns:Internal representation of all the compponents in the components.cif file.
Return type:{str, StructureReaderResult}
